sweets.title: Gulab-JAmun
sweets.description: Gulab jamun is an Indian dessert of fried dough balls that are soaked in a sweet, sticky sugar syrup.

sweets.title: Milk sweet
sweets.description: Sweet milk is a southern term referring to fresh, unprocessed whole milk.

sweets.title: kaju-katli
sweets.description: Kaju katli (literally 'cashew slice'), also known as kaju barfi, is an Indian dessert similar to a barfi.
